2.title: Failures
2.query:
timeseries avg(dt.service.request.failure_count), by: { dt.entity.service }
| fieldsAdd service.request.failure_count = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.service.request.failure_count)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.service, "entity.name")
| sort service.request.failure_count desc
| limit 20

4.title: Requests
4.query:
timeseries sum(dt.service.request.count), by: { dt.entity.service }
| fieldsAdd service.request.count = ArraySum(`sum(dt.service.request.count)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.service, "entity.name")
| sort service.request.count desc
| limit 20

6.title: JVM heap usage per pool
6.query:
timeseries avg(dt.runtime.jvm.memory_pool.used), by: { dt.entity.process_group_instance }
| fieldsAdd runtime.jvm.memory_pool.used = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.runtime.jvm.memory_pool.used)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.process_group_instance, "entity.name")
| sort runtime.jvm.memory_pool.used desc
| limit 20

11.title: Response Time (Avg)
11.query:
timeseries avg(dt.service.request.response_time), by: { dt.entity.service }
| fieldsAdd service.request.response_time = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.service.request.response_time)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.service, "entity.name")
| sort service.request.response_time desc
| limit 20

18.title: CPU usage %

19.title: Memory used %

20.title: Disk used %
20.query:
timeseries avg(dt.host.disk.used.percent), by: { dt.entity.host }
| fieldsAdd host.disk.used.percent = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.host.disk.used.percent)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "entity.name")
| fields `Host`=name, `Disk Usage`=host.disk.used.percent, Trend=`avg(dt.host.disk.used.percent)`, `Host ID`=dt.entity.host, timeframe, interval
| sort `Disk Usage` desc

21.title: Failures
21.query:
timeseries sum(dt.service.request.failure_count), by: { dt.entity.service }
| fieldsAdd dt.service.request.failure_count = "sum(dt.service.request.failure_count)"
| fieldsAdd service.request.failure_count = arraySum(`sum(dt.service.request.failure_count)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.service, "entity.name")
| filterOut service.request.failure_count == 0
| fields `Service Name`=name, Failures=service.request.failure_count, Trend=`sum(dt.service.request.failure_count)`, `Service ID`=dt.entity.service, timeframe, interval
| sort Failures desc
// | sort service.request.failure_count desc

22.title: Requests
22.query:
timeseries sum(dt.service.request.count), by: { dt.entity.service }
| fieldsAdd dt.service.request.count = "sum(dt.service.request.count)"
| fieldsAdd service.request.count = arraySum(`sum(dt.service.request.count)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.service, "entity.name")
| filterOut service.request.count == 0
| fields `Service Name`=name, Requests=service.request.count, Trend=`sum(dt.service.request.count)`, `Service ID`=dt.entity.service, timeframe, interval
| sort Requests desc

23.title: Response Time (Avg)
23.query:
timeseries avg(dt.service.request.response_time), by: { dt.entity.service }
| fieldsAdd dt.service.request.response_time = "avg(dt.service.request.response_time)"
| fieldsAdd service.request.response_time = arrayAvg(`avg(dt.service.request.response_time)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.service, "entity.name")
| filterOut service.request.response_time == 0
| fields `Service Name`=name, `Response Time`=service.request.response_time, Trend=`avg(dt.service.request.response_time)`, `Service ID`=dt.entity.service, timeframe, interval
| sort `Response Time` desc

24.title: JVM heap usage per pool
24.query:
timeseries avg(dt.runtime.jvm.memory_pool.used), by: { dt.entity.process_group_instance }
| fieldsAdd dt.runtime.jvm.memory_pool.used = "avg(dt.runtime.jvm.memory_pool.used)"
| fieldsAdd runtime.jvm.memory_pool.used = arrayAvg(`avg(dt.runtime.jvm.memory_pool.used)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.process_group_instance, "entity.name")
| filterOut runtime.jvm.memory_pool.used == 0
| fields `JVM Pool`=name, `Usage`=runtime.jvm.memory_pool.used, Trend=`avg(dt.runtime.jvm.memory_pool.used)`, `Service ID`=dt.entity.process_group_instance, timeframe, interval
| sort `Usage` desc
